item.description:
Start the weekend with good people and music at

 Marie's Sandwioch Shop - After Dark 

 on Friday evening, September 14th starting at 7:30 PM.

 

At 5:30 on Friday, the bustling, noisy, hurried diner transforms into a quiet, quaint, sophisticated destination for relaxation. Extraordinary cuisine is served on candle-lit white linen covered tables, while soft music plays in the background. Seating is limited, so reservations are recommended. Call (203) 268-0872. Note that there is some seating at the counter for walk-ins, etc. For more about Marie's, please visit their wbsite at: http://www.mariessandwichshop.com/Homepage.html.

Please note that the restaurant is BYOB and there is a $5 corkage fee.

The featured musician is your event host, Tom Ferrara, who is a Party Express! member. For those who may be new to Party Express! and haven't heard Tom perform, he plays a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes everyone from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom hass performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Marie's After Dark
